## Problem 1

### R Code
```
myf <- function(x) {

  return(prod(ifelse(x==0,1,x)))
}
```

### Output
> x <- 0:6

> myf(x)

[1] 720



## Problem 2

It could be a bit more readable, but too many years doing C...

###R Code
```
myfizzbuzz <- function(x) {
  
  return(
    ifelse((x %% 5==0) & (x %% 3==0) ,"FizzBuzz",
      ifelse((x %% 3==0),"Fizz",
        ifelse((x %% 5==0),"Buzz",x)
      )
    )
  )
}
```

### Output
> x <- 0:30

> myfizzbuzz(x)

 [1] "FizzBuzz" "1"        "2"        "Fizz"     "4"        "Buzz"    
 [7] "Fizz"     "7"        "8"        "Fizz"     "Buzz"     "11"
